name: OH NO! Aliens Stole My WiFi!!!
name_original: OH NO! Aliens Stole My WiFi!!!
description:
If you are a Windows user and experience lag I'd recommend trying the downloadable Windows version.

Made for the Opera GX Game Jam.

A cat who lives in your computer is sent out to retrieve your WiFi after it has been stolen by aliens. Fight your way through your computer which is full of alien invaders.

Play with a friend on the same keyboard (They get to play as a bunny, how cool is that?!)

Controls are explained on the main menu

6 unique enemy types and a boss.

This game is meant to be a "No Internet" game, so I decided to make there be some differences whether you play online or offline.
